title: 65  + Affordable Senior Housing
posting_body: Ravenswood Supportive Living is accepting applications for our brand new recently renovated Supportive Living Facility.
Are you or a loved one needing support at home, but still want to be able to be independent?
Then Ravenswood Supportive Living is the place for you.
Pets: 25# and under and up to date on vaccinations
Electric and Heating (central air and non radiator heating)
Secured Entrance with locked doors and camera access
Emergency Call lights in all tenant rooms and throughout facility
Assistants with Activities of Daily Living
$0 application fee and little to 0 move in fee!
Units are available now, but don't wait, this opportunity is once in a life time!

Ravenswood Supportive Living is committed to  without regard to the race, color, religion, gender (sex), disability (handicap), familial status, national origin, sexual orientation or gender identity of any prospective client, customer, or of the residents of any community.
